rules_text: Zirrat, the Soulsearcher costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
special_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
[+1]: Create a 2/2 blue Elemental Illusion creature token with flying and “Whenever this becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.”
[-3]: Return up to one other target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Draw a card.
